meta.description: Optimize the ordering of tables from suppliers A, B, and C to minimize cost while satisfying constraints.

params.name: cost_per_order
params.description: Cost per order from each supplier

params.name: tables_per_order
params.description: Number of tables per order from each supplier

vars.name: orders
vars.description: Number of orders from each supplier

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost_per_order[s] * orders[s] for s in SUPPLIERS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of orders

constraints.name: min_tables
constraints.expr_lhs: tables_per_order['A'] * orders['A'] + tables_per_order['B'] * orders['B'] + tables_per_order['C'] * orders['C']
constraints.description: At least 150 tables must be ordered

constraints.name: max_tables
constraints.expr_lhs: tables_per_order['A'] * orders['A'] + tables_per_order['B'] * orders['B'] + tables_per_order['C'] * orders['C']
constraints.description: At most 600 tables can be ordered

constraints.name: supplier_A_B_dependency
constraints.description: If ordering from A, must order at least 30 tables from B

constraints.name: supplier_B_C_dependency
constraints.description: If ordering from B, must order from C
